attributes.action: cancel the bid to host the 2018 World Cup
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the current financial climate this is a luxury we certainly can't afford.  Look how much the 2012 Olympics are costing!  Only when we can afford to provide essentials, and have enough money left over, should we even contemplate funding these sports extravaganzas!
